verbs.description: KANSAS CITY , Mo. -- [ARG1: May 14] [V: was] [ARG2: a historic day in Jerusalem] [ARGM-TMP: for the second time in history] [ARGM-TMP: as President Trump made good on his controversial campaign promise] . The United States opened its new embassy in the city .

KANSAS CITY , Mo. -- May 14 was a historic day in Jerusalem for the second time in history as [ARG0: President Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: good on his controversial campaign promise] . The United States opened its new embassy in the city .
